BasicInfo.short: Actev Motors develops safe all-electric smart go-karts.

Products.name: Arrow Smart-Kart
Products.description: Arrow Smart-Kart allows kids to play in the real world.

news.title: Actev Motors’ Arrow: The Smart Electric Go-Kart You Wish You’d Had as a Child
Actev Motors, co-founded by Tony Fadell, prepares to start shipping its smart go-karts
